subject: Football
Pro Bowl
lead_paragraph: Beckham, also the team’s lone representative in the Pro Bowl last season, was named to the squad a day after the N.F.L. suspended him for one game for unsportsmanlike and dangerous play.
snippet: Beckham, also the team’s lone representative in the Pro Bowl last season, was named to the squad a day after the N.F.L. suspended him for one game for unsportsmanlike and dangerous play.
